txt.en: Chickens Home to Roost
Speak with Mushêndu
'Thank you. Others talk of improving Urmâkh, but you're actually doing something about it. Thanks for your finding all my chickens and getting them back safely, it is quite a relief.'
Recover the first escaped chicken
Recover the third escaped chicken
'I'm glad you were able to help Mushêndu. I've been dispatched to bring you back to Urmâkh, there are other matters there that require your attention.'
You set the chicken down and it gives a slight nod of gratitude. Or it saw a worm in the grass
You set the chicken down and tell it to stay away from jackals. It blinks at you
You set the chicken down and tell it to stay away from jackals. It blinks at you
Recover the fourth escaped chicken
You set the chicken down and it gives a slight nod of gratitude. Or it saw a worm in the dirt
Recover the second escaped chicken
You close the gate behind you. The chickens share a meaningful glance, perhaps planning their next escape
Speak with Mushêndu
You close the gate behind you. The chickens share a meaningful glance, perhaps planning their next escape
TBD
Find the scout.

'Hashtal-gûr, friend. I'm so glad they finally sent someone. These legs are not as spry and fresh as they once were. Hard to get up and down these hills. My chickens have escaped again. Only thing they seem to have a talent for. Juicier worms on the other side of the fence, must be. They are damned fools though, there are jackals that prowl these hills. Few things are as good a meal for those beasts as a chicken.\n\n'Would you round them up before any harm can befall them?'
Speak with Mushêndu outside the chicken pen.
Speak with the farmer Mushêndu.

You set the chicken down and it immediately, if unsuccessfully, tries to escape again
The chicken has escaped! Despite its protestations, bring it back to Mushêndu

A local farmer outside Urmâkh has asked for help rounding up his escaped chickens.
